patthana7.9:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana7.9:2.1: Hetuyā ekatiṃsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṃsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekatiṃsa.
